statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT product_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE date_submitted >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, date_submitted FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_text LIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY date_submitted ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE date_submitted BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_rating < 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM GreenProducts WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM GreenProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN GreenProducts ON CustomerFeedback.product_id = GreenProducts.product_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM GreenProducts WHERE eco_friendly = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback JOIN GreenProducts ON CustomerFeedback.product_id = GreenProducts.product_id WHERE GreenProducts.category = 'Electronics';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_id = 2002 AND product_id = 101 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, customer_name FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM green_products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_rating FROM green_products ORDER BY product_rating DESC;
SELECT offering_id, offering_name, offering_discount FROM product_offerings WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, product_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id > 5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM green_products WHERE product_category = 'Organic' ORDER BY product_rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM green_products WHERE product_rating > 4.5;
SELECT offering_name, offering_discount FROM product_offerings ORDER BY offering_discount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback JOIN green_products ON customer_feedback.product_id = green_products.product_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM Customers INNER JOIN Feedback ON Customers.customer_id = Feedback.customer_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM Categories LEFT JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY product_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM Customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, product_price FROM Customers c JOIN Feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id JOIN Products p ON f.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, f.rating FROM Customers c JOIN Feedback f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id JOIN Products p ON f.product_id = p.product_id WHERE f.rating >= 4;
SELECT c.customer_name, c.customer_email, cat.category_name FROM Customers c LEFT JOIN Categories cat ON c.customer_id = cat.category_id WHERE c.customer_age < 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_category ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, overall_rating FROM products JOIN product_ratings ON products.product_id = product_ratings.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, pf.feedback_id, pr.overall_rating FROM products p JOIN product_feedback pf ON p.product_id = pf.product_id JOIN product_ratings pr ON p.product_id = pr.product_id;
